trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Elérhetővé teszi a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>, egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"> </xref> szerepel egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> való [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>a a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The column that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>.
trans-unit.target: Az oszlop a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> társított

trans-unit.source: The automation peer for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az automatizálási társ számára a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter"> </xref> , amely társítva van a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the header that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a vezérlőtípust a fejléc ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> számbavételi érték.

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that differentiates the header that is represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a nevet, amely megkülönbözteti a fejléc által képviselt <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The type name of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> property that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A típus neve a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>a társított tulajdonság <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Az objektumot, amely támogatja a megadott vezérlő minta az elemek, társított az automatizálási társ adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> object: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be sorted.
trans-unit.target: A következő esetekben egyik esetben ez a módszer adja vissza az aktuális <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>objektum:- `patternInterface` van <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>és a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>a társított objektum <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>rendezhetők.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` van <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>és a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>a társított objektum <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>a felhasználó által is átméretezhetők.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Egy számbavételi érték, amely meghatározza a vezérlő mintát.

trans-unit.source: The current object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális objektumot, ha patternInterface támogatott érték; ellenkező esetben .

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd a megjegyzések.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy az elem a automatizálási társ társított tartalmaz, amely a felhasználó számára megjelenő adatok lekérése.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>minden esetben.

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő aktiválásához, és az egyetlen, egyértelműen művelet kérelmet küld.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tag egy explicit illesztőfelületet tag végrehajtására.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Használat csak akkor, ha a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>példány típusúvá egy <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider>felületet.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the header and column that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref> into view.
trans-unit.target: A fejléc és a kapcsolódó oszlop görget a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> nézetbe.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
